span.img: COVID-19 Distance Learning Program for Students

span.span: Schools are closed to the general public for the remainder of the school year. Access limited to employees and scheduled appointments only.

strong.span: Walla Walla Public Schools campuses are closed to the general public through at least April 24 for COVID-19 precautions. WWPS is limiting access to the buildings to help keep everyone safe. Access will be for employees and scheduled appointments only.

h4.strong: Learn more about the district’s new Distance Learning Program being implemented March 23. Click HERE

p.strong: (Please remember to refresh your computer for current school closure updates! Any changes to the regular schedule will be posted by 6:15 a.m.)

p.br: * IMPORTANT NOTE * Every effort is made to bring updated school closure information in the event of bad weather or other conditions that would delay or cancel the normal school schedule. You may need to refresh your browser to get updated information. Check your browser information to see how to properly refresh. Our goal is to provide you an additional means of getting information about your area schools. Thank you.

span.p: At Walla Walla Public Schools, we make every effort to post up-to-the-minute school closure information due to inclement weather or any circumstance that would delay or cancel the normal school schedule. Decisions to delay or close school usually are made by 5:30 a.m. or earlier. This triggers the district’s comprehensive school closure/delay announcement plan. The district makes every effort to begin announcements by 6 a.m.
